channel.title: Roze Skincare
channel.description: CTX Feed - This product feed is generated with the CTX Feed - WooCommerce Product Feed Manager plugin by WebAppick.com. For all your support questions check out our plugin Docs on https://webappick.com/docs or e-mail to: support@webappick.com

item.g:title: Rice Moisturizing Cream with Retinol | Centella for 10X glow | No Dark Spots - Single
item.g:description:
PRODUCT NAME RICE ENZYME MOISTURIZING CREAM
KEY INGREDIENT Rice, Centella Asiatica, Vitamin C , Vitamin E, Nicotinamide, Retinol.
PRODUCT TYPE Cruelty- Free and Vegan
BENEFITS Moisturizing, Nourishing, Whitening, Exfoliating, Skin Revitalizing, Reduce Dark circles and Dark Spots, Firming, Brightens the skin, Pigmentation correcting, Blemish Clearing, Prevent premature aging and promotes Brighter complextion.
SKIN TYPE All Skin Types (Normal skin, Dry skin, Combination skin, Oily skin including sensitive skin)
SUITABLE FOR Both Men and Women
Net Weight 50g
Product Details :
Rice Enzyme Moisturizing Cream
Vegan | Cruelty-Free | All Skin Types | For Men & Women
Key Ingredients (Natural & Effective): •⁠ ⁠Rice Extract – Deeply hydrates and helps brighten dull skin. •⁠ ⁠Centella Asiatica – Soothes irritation and promotes skin healing. •⁠ Vitamin C – Brightens skin tone and reduces pigmentation. •⁠ Vitamin E – Nourishes and protects against environmental damage. •⁠ ⁠Nicotinamide (Niacinamide) – Fades dark spots and improves texture. •⁠ ⁠Retinol – Reduces fine lines, wrinkles, and signs of aging.
Skin Benefits (Power-Packed Formula): •⁠ ⁠Deep moisturizing cream for dry, dull skin. •⁠ ⁠Nourishes and revitalizes tired skin. •⁠ ⁠Supports whitening and brightening for a glowing complexion. •⁠ ⁠Helps clear blemishes and fade dark spots. •⁠ ⁠Visibly reduces dark circles under the eyes. •⁠ ⁠Improves skin elasticity and promotes firmness. •⁠ Exfoliates gently to reveal smoother, healthier skin. •⁠ ⁠Targets pigmentation and uneven skin tone. •⁠ ⁠Prevents premature aging and boosts radiance. •⁠ Promotes a clear, even, and luminous complexion.
Perfect For: •⁠ ⁠Suitable for all skin types: Normal skin, Dry skin, Oily skin, Combination skin & Sensitive skin •⁠ ⁠Gentle enough for daily use – morning & night •⁠ ⁠Ideal for both men and women
Net Weight: 50g
A lightweight yet deeply hydrating vegan Rice moisturizing face cream is for everyday use. FDA AND GMP CERTIFIED for the quality and effectiveness. Visible results in two weeks. Single
item.g:product_type: Sensitive Skin > Combination Skin > Normal Skin > Moisturizer

item.g:title: Rice Facial Cleanser with Gojiberries | Aloevera for Deep Cleanse | Radiant Glow - Pack of 2
item.g:description:
Rice Facial Cleanser
PRODUCT NAME RICE MOISTURIZING FACIAL CLEANSER
KEY INGREDIENT Rice, Aloevera, Goji Berries.
PRODUCT TYPE Cruelty Free, Vegan
BENEFITS Acne Treatment, Control excess sebum, Black Head remover, Deep Cleansing, Moisturizing, Nourishing, Pore Cleaning, Exfoliating, Prevents Premature aging.
SKIN TYPE All Skin Types. (Normal skin, Dry skin, Oily skin, Combination skin & Sensitive Skin)
SUITABLE FOR Both Men and Women
Net Weight 120g
All Our Skincare products are Dermatologically tested and Clinically proven safe on skin. We are GMP AND FDA Certified.
Product Details :
Rice Moisturizing Facial Cleanser
Vegan | Cruelty-Free | All Skin Types | For Men & Women
Say goodbye to dull, tired skin with our Rice Moisturizing Facial Cleanser – a nourishing daily face wash designed to purify, moisturize, and revive your skin. Powered by natural ingredients, cleanser offers multiple skincare benefits in one gentle formula.
Key Ingredients: •⁠ ⁠Rice Extract – Moisturizes, Helps brighten complexion, control excess oil and prevents acne •⁠ ⁠Aloe Vera – Soothes irritation and hydrates deeply. •⁠ ⁠Goji Berries – Packed with antioxidants to fight signs of aging, Boosts collagen.
Key Benefits: •⁠ ⁠Fights and prevents acne breakouts •⁠ ⁠Controls excess sebum and reduces shine •⁠ ⁠Works as a blackhead remover and deep pore cleanser •⁠ ⁠Gently exfoliates dead skin cells for smoother texture •⁠ ⁠Hydrates, moisturizes, and nourishes the skin •⁠ ⁠Supports skin’s natural barrier and helps prevent premature aging •⁠ ⁠Leaves skin clean, soft, and radiant
Perfect For: •⁠ ⁠All Skin Types: Normal skin, Dry skin, Oily skin, Combination skin & Sensitive skin •⁠ ⁠Daily Use – morning and night •⁠ ⁠Both Men and Women
Made with love, free from animal testing, and formulated without harsh chemicals. GMP AND FDA CERTIFIED for product quality and Effectiveness. Visible results in two weeks. Pack of 2
item.g:product_type: Sensitive Skin > Combination Skin > Normal Skin > Cleanser
